Gets expression anatomy associated with a gene.

Source: R/monarchr.R

bioentity_exp_anatomy_assoc_w_gene.Rd

Given a gene, what expression anatomy is associated with it.

bioentity_exp_anatomy_assoc_w_gene(gene, rows = 100)

Arguments

gene

A valid monarch initiative gene id.
rows

Number of rows of results to fetch.

Value

A list of (tibble of anatomy information, monarch_api S3 class).

Details

https://api.monarchinitiative.org/api/bioentity/gene/NCBIGene

Examples

gene <- "NCBIGene:8314"
bioentity_exp_anatomy_assoc_w_gene(gene)
#> $anatomy
